knimeNode.name: Dictionary tagger
knimeNode.shortDescription: Assigns tags to named entities specified in the given list.

fullDescription.intro: This node recognizes named entities specified in the given list and assigns a specified tag. Optionally the recognized named entity terms can be set unmodifiable, meaning that the terms are not modified or filtered afterwards by any following node.
fullDescription.option: Sets recognized named entity terms unmodifiable.
If checked, case sensitive named entity recognition will be applied, otherwise not.
Specifies the location of the dictionary file.
Specifies the type of tag to use for tagging recognized named entities.

ports.inPort: The input table containing the documents to tag.
ports.outPort: An output table containing the tagged documents.
